page.title: 19FIELD TRIPS, BURSTON AREA
page.content: GROUP 1: A most enjoyable exercise, once people discovered who we were and what our purpose was, they were very helpful and showed great interest in the project. GROUP 2: What impressed us about this area was how quiet and peaceful everywhere seemed. Although it was the time of the school holidays, no noise was heard. GROUP 3: We walked in the rain through muddy gateways, over fields, and talked to farmers. It is lovely green country- side with mellow brick farmsteads. GROUP 4: Our walk across fields and along narrow lanes afforded views of the beautiful scenery. The stillness was broken only by grazing cattle and startled rabbits.
